title: Quantized 2d Dilaton Gravity and Black Holes
abstract: We have examined a modified dilaton gravity whose action is separable into the kinetic and the cosmological terms for the sake of the quantization. The black hole solutions survive even in the quantized theory, but the ADM mass of the static solution is unbounded from below. Quantum gravitational effect on the interacting matter field and the string susceptibility of the dilaton gravity are also examined.
